name: I AM YOU AND YOU ARE ME
name_original: I AM YOU AND YOU ARE ME
description:
I AM YOU AND YOU ARE ME is a simple choose your own path text game. 

As soon as you begin, you will talk to a being claiming to be you in an alternate mirrored world.  As you talk to it, you can choose to listen to what it tells you or you can go against it and annoy it. If you choose to go against it, you could end up on a path of comedy, intrigue, anger, annoyance, or even... Romance? Which path will you end on?

DISCLAIMER: There was unfortunately an issue with the music resulting in the music not playing properly. If you are unable to hear the music, I apologize!
